scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:login && npm run build:signup && npm run build:landing
scripts.dev: concurrently "npx tailwindcss -i ./src/style.css -o ./dist/style.css --watch" "npx tailwindcss -i ./src/LoginPage/style.css -o ./dist/LoginPage/style.css --watch" "npx tailwindcss -i ./src/SignupPage/style.css -o ./dist/SignupPage/style.css --watch" " npx tailwindcss -i ./src/LandingPage/style.css -o ./dist/LandingPage/style.css --watch "
